chara.textHome: My name's Ui Tamaki.
I'm still new at all this Magical Girl stuff.

I spent a long time in the hospital,
so there's a lot I don't know.

I might not get how a lot of things work,
but I'd be happy to become friends.
Oh, and my big sister's a Magical Girl, too.
I'll introduce you to her next time.

I may have put on a brave face, but I used
to cry a lot when I was in the hospital...
Don't tell Iroha I said that though.
It would only hurt her to hear...
It's small, but I noticed something.

I think Iroha goes through some hard
things at school.
I won't say anything though.
I'll keep it locked up tight.
Everyone, please lend me your power...
I'll pull it all together and hurl it at them!

With all these Magical Girls around,
I have to get used to things on the outside!
Right, left, right, green light!
There, I remember the traffic safety rules!
It's still scary though.

All sorts of things can come
crashing at you in a city.
My goal today is to be of help to everyone.

Stopping fights, getting along,
singing happily together...

I know it sounds like I'm just saying that,
but that's what I really want to do!

I'm pretty stubborn about it,
just like my sister.
Ahh, I'm so happy you remembered me.
But are you sure?
I don't want to be a bother...

I can hear the birds tweeting outside.
If I stick my head out the window,
I can breathe in all the fresh air.
What a beautiful morning!

Octopus-shaped sausages,
steamed broccoli, and potato salad.
I'm trying the recipes Iroha taught me. So?
Do they look tasty?
I'm Ui Tamaki.
Umm, thanks for, you know, choosing me!

I'm really glad! I'll fight really hard and
make sure everyone else is happy too!

From dusk to when it gets dark,
that's my favorite time of the day.
It just feels so homey.

I get to eat and watch TV together
with everyone today.
I'm excited.
Ohh, it's dark... Hey, Touka? Nemu?
Ah, I'm not in the hospital anymore.
Maybe Iroha's awake...

No, no! I have to be careful or
I'll start singing without thinking...

The other day people laughed at me for doing
that, and people might think I'm weird, so...
I need to try not to do it.

I can hunt Witches on my own now,
but it's still scary...
I don't mean the Witches are scary though.
I'm more scared of getting lost...

I don't wanna!
Th-the Mirror Mansion's like
a haunted house, isn't it?!
...Huh? It's a Labyrinth?
Then that's okay...I guess?
I'm pretty good at drawing.

That's why I was the one in charge of
drawing when Nemu and Touka talked.
Look, I can do portraits, too!
I like PE the most.

There were people who taught us before,
but we couldn't play any sports then,
so it all feels really new!

So recently, I've been taking pictures
and posting them on social media.
Look, here's a cat during sunset.
Oh, and some flowers!
Ahh, but I never upload pics of myself.
That'd be dangerous.

A while ago, the teacher at the hospital
called some college students to sing for us.
I love choirs, so I was overjoyed!

Touka and Nemu used to be so stubborn,
they were always arguing.

That's why I'm so glad to see
them getting along now.
*Giggle*

I was just on a group call with my family,
and when I told them I was ranked number 1
in PE, my parents were both really surprised.

Oh... *Sob* Sis thought of all these
recipes for me, her sick sister...
These notes are filled with so many feelings.

My world is getting bigger
every second of every day...
That's why I don't regret anything.

I never even thought a time like this would
come when I'd get to see so much.
You know, there's someone I like.
It's... my big sister!
And Touka and Nemu, too!
*Giggle* I love everyone.
I'm going to soak everything up!
Hey Sis, I was able to beat them!
Yeah, my power's getting steadier now!
Thanks, little sparrow!
I can help now, I think.
I look the same, but...I'm different.
I feel all warm inside.

I'm not satisfied yet.
I'm still weak.
I have to try harder.
Oh, I don't know any good stories...
Ah! I think I remembered something!

I used to jot down notes about what
my sister told me about school,
trying to imagine what kind of school
I would go to if I got out of the hospital.

Don't tell anyone I told you that, okay?
It's embarrassing.
